actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide hospital care and medical services in Veterans' Administration facilities to Commonwealth Army veterans for service-connected disabilities at such times as such veterans may require such care and services while within the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes hospital care and medical services in Veterans' Administration facilities to Philippines Commonwealth Army veterans for service-connected disabilities at such times as such veterans may require such care and services while within the United States. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 632)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide hospital care and medical services in Veterans' Administration facilities to Commonwealth Army veterans for service-connected disabilities at such times as such veterans may require such care and services while within the United States.
